activities: IVR Clinical Concepts Inc uses electronic data collection methods in order to obtain data from subjects enrolled in clinical trials known as subject diary data.

recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) will be used for dispute resolution involving clinical trial data.
